pr_title: Add function name lookup for c++ functions.

timeline.message: Fix primary checkstyle error in Javadoc comment
Fix primary checkstyle error in Javadoc comment
Fix primary checkstyle error in Javadoc comment
Fix primary checkstyle error in Javadoc comment

add looking for linkage/displayName while looking for functions

In order to call methods by their 'real' declared name even if the LLVM
bitcode provides only the linkage name in the signature, a different
lookup has to be done.
add tests for looking up C++ function names
Fix primary checkstyle error in Javadoc comment
Fix primary checkstyle error in Javadoc comment

timeline.bodyText: I think this is not needed and makes it harder to understand. The caller (LLVMParser) can call parser.parseLinkageName(runtime) directly.
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.bodyText: I think we should have Javadoc that mentions that  MetadataSubprogramOnly throws.
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.bodyText: I think we should mention why it is ok that exit is never called in the case where MetadataSubprogramOnly throws.
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.bodyText: Please add Javadoc that describes what this class is used for (finding MDSubprogram) and how the result is returned (via throwing MDSubprogramParserException).
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.bodyText: For readability, I'd change for LLVM from C++, ... to for LLVM code produced from C++ sources
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.bodyText: Multiline comments (/* */) and proper sentences to make the formatter happy.
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.bodyText: I'd create a new test class for testing C++ members (e.g. CxxMembersTest). Not a blocker, though.
timeline.author: zapster

timeline.message: Add SulongEngineOption for C++ interop features, minor style fixes.

timeline.bodyText: You can use parserRuntime.getContext() here, that's more efficient. LLVMLanguage.getContext() needs to look up the context from a thread-local.
timeline.author: rschatz
